website_summaries.verdict: This dry case is a great fit for your thumb drives, hearing aids, iPod classic and other smaller electronics.
pros: Clear polycarbonate lid and stainless steel hardware
Interior dimensions: 4.37 inches by  2.87 inches by 1.71 inches
Great for hikes, camping, boating and protective storage while rafting, snorkeling, or diving
A good size to store thumb drives, hearing aids, iPod classic, small cameras and electronics accessories
cons: Case is too small to hold a smart phone

customer_reviews.title: Great to carry a Garmin Virb 360
customer_reviews.text: I am using this case to carry a. It fits perfectly with its two mount pieces! Before I was always worried about scratching the lenses. I also love the fact that it does not take much more space in my backpack, the case is pretty small. I carried it in my backpack for 8 days, doing daily hikes and it kept the camera very safe (the camera is waterproof, but the lenses are made of plastic). It also makes organization easier.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne FTop Contributor: Scuba Diving

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: I am a photographer and my Profoto transmitters are expensive. They have to coexist in the same bag as my lights and it would be very easy for them to bounce around. This case holds the transmitter and some back up AAA batteries safely. This is very affordable insurance for your delicate or fragile gear.
customer_reviews.author: NBC TN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small items
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I love these small Pelican cases to hold many small items that I don't want to get wet or lose! I purchased this red one and also a blue one. Like other items on amazon, the cost is dependent on the color of the case, so if the color doesn't matter to you, look at several colors to find the least expensive one! Price varies wildly depending on color!
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Super durable.
customer_reviews.text: I have to put in several eye drops a day. When I travel, I put them in this case and never have to worry about crushing them. I've also taken it fishing and put my key inside. Waterproofing works.
customer_reviews.author: J Takamori

customer_reviews.title: Very functional small storage box
customer_reviews.text: Our company has a number of tiny to large cases . This one with a see-through lid is great for smaller items. No issues with loose lids, water leaks or others.
customer_reviews.author: GLETS President

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for my application
customer_reviews.text: Solid, clasps shut securely. Happens to fit a Sony RX100 M3 like it was made for it. I also attach the case via carabiner to my kayak deck rigging.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Iannotti

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I purchased for my dive bag to throw ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I purchased for my dive bag to throw bandaids, sting relief etc in. Works great. Kinda wish I would have bought the next size up so I could put more in it but it is working great for what I wanted to use it for!
customer_reviews.author: S. Mro

customer_reviews.title: Quality Manufacturing, Great Design.
customer_reviews.text: This case is a little bigger than I expected. I bought it to hold some IEMs and it's bigger than I require, yet I think it's the smallest one. Check the specs if you're unsure. But it's really nice! It's solid, built like a tank, and good looking. And you can't beat the price. There's no ambiguity with this thing: it will protect your gear.
customer_reviews.author: Eric L.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for iPad GPS receiver
customer_reviews.text: Double sided taped this to our boats hard T-top and use it for the Bluetooth GPS receiver for my iPad. Works great with a small foam block to keep receiver tight in place. Using a boating app we now have an additional chart plotter on the boat. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: DH Walters

customer_reviews.title: It’s a pelican, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: This will keep small things safe and dry. Good for cigarettes in wet places. Also seems to be smell proof. I’ve dropped it multiple time from around 4 ft and the latch and body have taken the hit just fine
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Water Resistant not Waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: There is some misleading language in the listing. In the beginning, I found it searching for waterproof cases. When you read further down the listing, you see that it is water resistant not waterproof. When I got the package, I noticed that there was a pressure release valve so it isn't waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Draekon

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: I made a mistake and should have come up a size. Not much fits in this tiny thing :(
customer_reviews.author: D'Anna Watson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for day-hike first aid kit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a day-hike first aid kit. Fits nicely in a day pack and being a Pelican case, everything is well -protected. Will be purchasing a couple of more for supply storage in day-hike kits.
customer_reviews.author: H. J. Elston

customer_reviews.title: Keep it dry.
customer_reviews.text: This case really works. Can be used my unlimited purpose...I use mine to keep my insulin pump protected when in rainy conditions. A must for camping and keeping expensive item dry.
customer_reviews.author: Good Guy

customer_reviews.title: Pelican is a great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great for holding my keys, earbuds, and other small items.
customer_reviews.author: RuffWater1

customer_reviews.title: High quality, airtight, perfect pipe size.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality. Perfect size to hold a pipe and lighter and airtight. For on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Pruett

customer_reviews.title: Great case to keep electronics dry
customer_reviews.text: It is a great case to keep electronics dry. However a bit too snug for a Gotenna mesh unit.
customer_reviews.author: Alex P.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Strong but not red
customer_reviews.text: It is a very sturdy well built case. I got the red color hoping it would be high visibility... alas it is not. it is more a tasteful maroon or burgundy color. It does not jump out at you. On the other hand, things will be very safe inside it...
customer_reviews.author: Jonny

customer_reviews.title: Strong, with a handy clip
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a hearing aid, because the case it came with broke after 3 weeks. This looks like it won't break, but it will also need modification to work. I think I will have to find some foam and cut it to fit inside, etc. The clip is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: J. GrayTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Fits Go Pro Hero 5 black
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to store my $400 Go Pro, didn't care about the waterproof aspects of it because the camera is waterproof as is, but I like that Pelican is Crush Proof!
customer_reviews.author: HTC Ranch (On YouTube)

customer_reviews.title: Pelican Tough!
customer_reviews.text: Strong and extremely durable. Seals tight and the carabiner is handy too.
customer_reviews.author: TStech

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: No measurements smaller than appears in pictures. Too small for cell phone
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Clapham

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to keep water in, and this does the trick. I especially like the rubber insert, to protect my retainers while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: LLM

customer_reviews.title: BEST CASE FOR IEM's
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with Pelican. They started it all.
customer_reviews.author: Digital Ninja®Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Keeps things dry.
customer_reviews.text: This case is durable and is something that works if you want your small things not to get wet, maybe your remote for your car. The bottom has a rubber like padding which helps to soften the banging around when moving around.
customer_reviews.author: Tony F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dry box for my keys
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect my hearing aids when out in the kayak, but it is roomy enough to protect my keys as well.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Schenck

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I keep my in-ear monitors in this case without having to worry about them getting crushed in my backpack. Very durable
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my hearing aids contrary to probably what they are used for and it has not broken yet. Keeps everything sealed inside and am able to carry a few small items in it.
customer_reviews.author: Cassius

customer_reviews.title: Strong n durable container
customer_reviews.text: A very strong n durable container to keep ya item safe, apparently I was thinking of keeping some items in it but it too big, so I may use it to make a small survival kit for my edc bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sham Hoe Meng

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love Pelican cases and this one is no different. I bought this one for a very specific reason and it works perfectly for it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Szymanski

customer_reviews.title: Pelican 1010 - Can't Go Wrong
customer_reviews.text: Pelican is never disappointing, always first class construction and robust sealing. I plan on adding several more products in different sizes to solve my storage needs.
customer_reviews.author: Ken S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Pax 2
customer_reviews.text: Very secured and hard shell. I use this to carry my Pax 2. It seal the smell of anything.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Extra phone battery case
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, I used this to store my anker charger and 2 extra batteries. I don't want to damage my battery so yeah. This thing keeps it getting crushed inside my backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Jp Bajos

customer_reviews.title: Nice Box
customer_reviews.text: Great little box and the carabiner is handy so you can attach it to your luggage and it stays handy
customer_reviews.author: Tom Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Bought for putting the car keys in when snorkeling/diving. Does the job perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: KMR

customer_reviews.title: Pelican products are very well-made. This particular case is ...
customer_reviews.text: Pelican products are very well-made. This particular case is small. If you need more space, Pelican makes many more models from which to choose.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Saved my camera
customer_reviews.text: I was in a canoe with this case attached to my belt when the canoe flipped over. The camera was underwater for at least 20 minutes and the case did not leak a drop. I am a believer.
customer_reviews.author: NC Bob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A high quality case available in many sizes. I use it for my hearing aids with spare parts, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Don Pluta

customer_reviews.title: This is not what I wanted. This isn't red ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not what I wanted. This isn't red, it's more of a burgundy color. If this is what somebody is calling red, they can't tell colors very well.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Ward

customer_reviews.title: and it did fit my Insta360 Nano which was great!
customer_reviews.text: It's Pelican...what more can I say? Oh, and it did fit my Insta360 Nano which was great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for geocaching
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for Christmas, I put it on my wish list to use for Geocaching. It works great for this purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Joe and Leanne

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory for the farm
customer_reviews.text: Carry this on the tractor filled with extra ear plugs, band aids, matches , tweezers, everything stays dry and ready.
customer_reviews.author: Wildlife

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof as promised. Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I wore shorts to snorkel and attached the case to my belt loop. Fit my credit card, cash, and car keys. Worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: Luli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love these boxes. waterproof, smell proof, airtight and reliable organization. I've yet to have one fail.
customer_reviews.author: picky

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Its a standard small pelican case. Good quality, seals well. The red is a darker shade than in the picture, but that is fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Shmoe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth case from pelican I bought, they make outstanding products.
customer_reviews.author: VICTOR A. ROSADO

customer_reviews.title: It's a Pelican case -- what more is there to say?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to add a little dust and water-proof storage under the seat of my motorcycle. It fits perfectly in the battery tray, and keeps things dry and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Marcin K. Porwit

customer_reviews.title: Heck ya!
customer_reviews.text: I love pelican, its great, expensive, but they are badass.
customer_reviews.author: A Damn Fool

customer_reviews.title: which come with a beautifully made leather case that is just too small
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this case for my Ibasso it03 headphones, which come with a beautifully made leather case that is just too small !!! This pelican case is the perfect size and I could drive my car over it and my headphones would fine. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Kevin G.

customer_reviews.title: Love it - I've purchased more!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. It keeps anything smelly (cigars and the like) from stinking up my purse. I spray painted the lid white before using it so the contents wouldn't be easily visible.
customer_reviews.author: C. Scott

customer_reviews.title: I love hard cases!
customer_reviews.text: It is a small red hardcase. Probably at most capable of holding what is in your closed hand. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb Hebert

customer_reviews.title: This water proof case fits my small wide angle camera ...
customer_reviews.text: This water proof case fits my small wide angle camera perfectly and will hold any cards I want to bring kayaking, it is too small for my android phone. The case is well made and will get a trial run on the water in just a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Woman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The product was great. I simply ordered the wrong size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excelent Little Case
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this little care. We use them for our mobile credit card readers in our tow trucks. Perfect fit for both caring cord, and credit card readers combined.
customer_reviews.author: Jared K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: ARSSR
customer_reviews.text: All of these cases are great very good product. Would love to have them all

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watertight container.
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for holding a small wallet and keys. This container keeps your belongings dry.
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a Pelican case, works very well with what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Neideffer

customer_reviews.title: Both tabs on the clasp are broken. It came ...
customer_reviews.text: Both tabs on the clasp are broken. It came with one chipped but now both gone. I own 5 of these and this is the only one that broke.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Item was far bigger than anticipated... it's ...
customer_reviews.text: Item was far bigger than anticipated...it's really a underwater phone case...it's too loose for hearing aids which is what I bought it to store.
customer_reviews.author: Pambooca

customer_reviews.title: The size I needed
customer_reviews.text: Although not listed as "waterproof" this little case is well made - surely water resistant if not proof from brief shallow immersions (think over the side from a capsized canoe or soaked in rain). It was what I needed and fits very nicely in a small MOLLE case I strap on to my pack for immediate use items.
customer_reviews.author: Just Bob

product_meta.title: Pelican 1010 Micro Case (Red/Clear) (1010-028-100)
product_meta.description:
This water-resistant, crushproof case is ideal for rugged activities. It will keep your expensive GPS, and other electronics and documents safe and secure.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


ANATOMY OF A PELICAN MICRO CASE
 ULTIMATE EQUIPMENT PROTECTION
 For over 30 years Pelican has built a reputation for manufacturing the toughest cases in the world. As a matter of fact, we invented the category. Over these years we've seen our cases used for some fairly crazy activities...and important ones too.

 Pelican Micro Cases are created for your smaller items. Micro Cases look and function in the same way as the larger Pelican Cases, but are designed to protect your cell phone, iPod, camera, and other small items. Many of the cases are water resistant and crushproof, or impact resistant to provide maximum protection for your valuables. These cases will get your gear from point A to point B in the condition it's meant to be in: intact and functional.

STRONGER BY DESIGN
 Pelican Cases are made with a proprietary combination of homo and co-polymers, using an open cell core and solid wall construction, which is stronger and lighter than a solid core wall. Stainless steel pins are used in hinges and handles.

WATERTIGHT
 The secret is the tongue and groove fit with a polymer O-ring acting as a waterproof seal. Some models come with the Automatic Pressure Equalization Valve which balances interior pressure, keeping water out while making the case easy to open.

 LINER FOR EXTRA PROTECTION
 Your valuables should be protected on the inside as well as the outside. Pelican Micro Cases contain a shock absorbent liner to minimize damage to contents in tough situations.

MICRO CASE COMPARISON

MICRO ICASE COMPARISON
Full Use of Your Electronics: i1010 and i1015 Micro Cases feature a specially designed external jack allows you to listen to music on your device while providing full protection from the elements.
